subject: Simsonn plus x throttle
description_text:
Hey there, I got my pedals setup yesterday and the throttle has absolutely
no input. The brake and clutch are both perfect. I've got the software
updated, I've tried changing usb ports, unplugging and replugging, nothing
is working. Im not sure if there's something I can check myself before
sending them back, hopefully I've simply overlooked something. Thanks for
your help!
